question: Which of the following statement is not true about the First Round Table Conference?
option2: It was to discuss the Report of the Simon Commission
option4: It was attended by the Congress delegation
answer: It was attended by the Congress delegation
explanation: The British Government summoned Indian leaders and spokesmen in the First Round Table conference (1930) to discuss the Simon Commission report. But the Indian National Congress boycotted the conference and this conference of Indian affairs was held without the Congress.
